survey_properties.intro_message:
Your feedback helps us to build a better mobile product.


Hello, Feedback from our clients, friends and family is how we make key decisions on what the future holds for XYZ App.

By combining data and previous feedback we have introduced many new features e.g. x, y, z.

It will take less than 2 minutes to answer the feedback quiz.
survey_properties.end_message: 感謝您的填寫，請問是否要現在將資料回傳？

ESMQuestions.question_title:
What's your attendance order when seeing
these notifications in notification drawer
10 min before?(swipe left if don't need to attend)

What's your attendance order when seeing
these notifications in notification drawer
10 min before?(swipe left if don't need to attend)

What's your desired display order when seeing
these notifications in notification drawer
10 min before?(swipe left if don't need to attend)

下列為兩種排序之結果
(左：點擊順序, 右：實際呈現順序)
